name: PicMix - The Picture Sliding Tile Puzzle Game
name_original: PicMix - The Picture Sliding Tile Puzzle Game
description:
The fantastic puzzle tile picture slide game comes to your iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch with PicMix!

Featuring;

~ Use your own photo library images to create a puzzle!

~ Choose from 8 amazing default images!

~ Customize your game settings, change rows and/or columns!

~ Make it harder, remove number hints!

~ Universal App - iPhone,iPhone5,iPad Mini,iPad & iPod Touch Compatible!

~ FREE*!

Addictive puzzle gameplay make PicMix an essential part of your game collection!


* PicMix is advertisement-supported, however these can be removed as part of an in-app upgrade.
